Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.Space

  • Packages that use Space 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.venues3d
    This package provides facilities to search and display objects representing three-dimensional views of venues.

    • Uses of Space in com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.venues3d that return Space 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Space VenueController.getSelectedSpace()
      This method retrieves the selected Space or null if no space is currently selected.
      Space VenueManeuver.getSpace()
      Returns an Space object related to this maneuver.
      Space Venue.getSpace(java.lang.String id)
      This method retrieves the space or the facility as the Space object based on the given identifier inside this Venue.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.venues3d that return types with arguments of type Space 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Space> Level.getSortedSpaces()
      This method retrieves an alphabetically-ordered list of Space objects for the given instance of Level, excluding facilities.
      java.util.List<Space> Venue.getSortedSpaces()
      This method retrieves the alphabetically ordered array of Space objects for the given Venue.
      java.util.List<Space> Level.getSortedSpacesByCategory(java.lang.String categoryName)
      This method retrieves an alphabetically-ordered list of Space objects that belong to the category specified by the caller for all the OuterArea instances that belong to the given Level.
      java.util.List<Space> Level.getSortedSpacesWithFacilities()
      This method retrieves an alphabetically-ordered list of all the Space objects associated with all the OuterArea objects of the given instance of Level.
      java.util.List<Space> OuterArea.getSpaces()
      This method retrieves an array of Space objects for the given instance of OuterArea.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.venues3d with parameters of type Space 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StyleSettings VenueController.getStyleSettings(Space space)
      Returns StyleSettings object for the specific space.
      void VenueGestureListener.onSpaceDeselected(Venue venue, Space space) 
      void VenueMapFragment.VenueListener.onSpaceDeselected(Venue venue, Space space)
      This callback method is triggered when a space is deselected.
      void VenueGestureListener.onSpaceSelected(Venue venue, Space space) 
      void VenueMapFragment.VenueListener.onSpaceSelected(Venue venue, Space space)
      This callback method is triggered when a space is tapped.
      void VenueController.selectSpace(Space space)
      This method selects the space specified by the caller from the given Venue.
      void VenueController.setStyleSettings(StyleSettings settings, Space space)
      Sets StyleSettings object for the specific space.
      Constructors in com.here.android.mpa.venues3d with parameters of type Space 
      Constructor and Description
      SpaceLocation(Space space, VenueController venueController)
      Constructs a space location object with a given space and venue controller objects.
